extends java.lang.Object

      • allWorkouts

        @GetMapping(value="/{userid}")
public java.lang.String allWorkouts(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                    @PathVariable(value="userid")
                                                                    int userid)
        this method retrieves the current user session id and then displays the users workout plans and maps the url to be the user id
        Parameters:
        model - defines the attributes of title and users workouts to be rendered in the view
        userid - the current session user
        Returns:
        this returns the jsp page that displays users workouts

      • add

        @GetMapping(value="/add")
public java.lang.String add(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        creates a new workout plan
        Parameters:
        model - the workout object is added to the model to be rendered in page
        Returns:
        the add jsp page to be returned

      • saveWorkout

        @PostMapping(value="/saveWorkout")
public java.lang.String saveWorkout(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                        @ModelAttribute @Valid
                                                                        @Valid WorkoutPlan workoutPlan,
                                                                        @RequestParam
                                                                        int userid)
        saves the workout plan to to the current user session
        Parameters:
        model -
        workoutPlan - the workout plan to be added to user
        userid - the current user session
        Returns:
        redirect back to this workout view jsp

                                                                            @PathVariable
                                                                            int workoutId)
        this method will find the workout to be viewed
        Parameters:
        model - the attributes required for a workout
        workoutId - the id of the specific workout to be viewed
        Returns:
        the view jsp and mapped to workout id

        @GetMapping(value="/add-item/{workoutId}")
public java.lang.String addItem(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                            @PathVariable
                                                                            int workoutId)
                                                                     throws java.io.IOException

        workoutId - the specific workout plan
        Returns:
        the jsp page to add exercises

      • addItem

        @PostMapping(value="/add-item")
public java.lang.String addItem(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                 @ModelAttribute
                                                                 AddWorkoutPlanItemForm form,
                                                                 org.springframework.validation.Errors errors)
        this method adds exercises to the specific workout plan
        Parameters:
        model - adds AddWorkoutPlanItemForm to model attribute
        form - the workout plan and list of exercises
        errors - adds AddWorkoutPlanItemForm attribute to model if there is error
        Returns:
        the specific view jsp for that workout plan

      • deleteWorkout

        @GetMapping(value="{userid}/delete/{workoutId}")
public java.lang.String deleteWorkout(@PathVariable(value="userid")

                                                                                        @PathVariable(value="workoutId")
                                                                                        int workoutId)
        deletes a workout
        Parameters:
        userid - the current user session id
        workoutId - the specific workout id to be deleted
        Returns:
        redirects back to workout plan jsp of that user session
